category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 32 (Relief from confirmed disciplinary action, etc.)
contents: Article 32 (Relief from confirmed disciplinary action, etc.) ① After disciplinary action has been confirmed pursuant to Articles 31 and 34, if a person who has been disciplined applies for relief for any of the following reasons, the Committee shall make a decision. Disciplinary action may be reduced, terminated, or canceled in accordance with Table 4. 1. Deleted 2022. 1. 24. 2. Deleted 2022. 1. 24. 3. The investigative agency's decision not to indict on the charges (limited to no charges, not guilty) has been confirmed or the court's decision of not guilty has been confirmed. Case 4. When the regulations on the subject of disciplinary action, standards, statute of limitations, etc. are changed so that the charges at the time do not constitute grounds for disciplinary action. ② Even if there is a reduction in the sentence under paragraph 1, the effects that have already occurred due to the disciplinary action shall not be changed. ③ If there is a court ruling of invalidity or cancellation regarding a confirmed disciplinary action, the disciplinary action shall be deemed to have lapsed at the time the decision is confirmed. ④ Deleted December 26, 2022 ⑤ Deleted December 26, 2022 ⑥ Disciplinary measures decided by the committee cannot be reduced, terminated, or canceled by member sports organizations, member city/provincial sports associations, or city/provincial sports organizations. ⑦ Deleted 2022. 12. 26.
